content.description: ENERGY COST FOR FOUR DIFFERENT RENEWABLE SOURCES (in <math alttext="U S dollars per megawatt hour" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>US dollars/MWh</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>)
content.question: Annual Electricity Cost Solar <math alttext="P V" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>PV</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> Wind Offshore Wind Onshore Hydroelectric Minimum <math alttext="98" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>98</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="170" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>170</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="66" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>66</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="69" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>69</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Average <math alttext="125" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>125</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="197" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>197</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="74" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>74</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="84" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>84</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Maximum <math alttext="193" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>193</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="270" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>270</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="82" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>82</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="107" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>107</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Based on the data above, approximately how much greater is the average cost of electricity produced in the United States from offshore wind than from hydroelectric power?

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Calculate an accurate numeric answer with appropriate units.
